marklogic.body: Â Thanks for asking sky king. Well after battling with it for a week...and digging up the water lines in 3 Spots thinking there was a major leak since I could not pressurize the lines, I also cut and plugged Off outllying lines in two Spot to minimize the chances the leak was there, I decided it wasn't a leak but more likely a burp or something in the wellsaver pressure tank. Not even sure what I did but with the pump on I cut the flow to the well saver and then opened the flow again and that did it! I still don't understand.
